name: Christmas Ball Drop
description:
Can you catch all the Christmas Balls before they hit the ground? "This app makes a great Christmas Gift!"

"Christmas Ball Drop is fun, exciting and challenging! Fun of the whole family!"

Move your basket from side to side catching the Christmas Balls as they fall from the top of the screen. Catch the number of Christmas Balls needed to complete each level. Each level gets more challenging. If you drop too many Christmas Balls the game is over!

Complete all 5 levels and you Win the Game! Be careful, it is not as easy as it sounds!

There are 4 Skill levels and 5 exciting game levels to play.

There are two styles of game play.

"Regular" & "One Shot"

Regular - allows you to drop 3 Christmas balls in any level before game is over.

One Shot - if you drop 1 Christmas ball in any level, the game is over.

Are you up to the Christmas Ball Drop challenge? The only way to find out is to play!

Merry Christmas!


* If you like this app, please write a review and also share this app with your friends on Facebook and Twitter. Thank you.

** If you are experiencing technical problems with this app, or if you have ideas on how to make this app better, please contact us by pressing the "App Support" button located in the Information screen.

Thank you.
